create a folder to mount your hard drive to
for example : sudo mkdir /media/mac
now let's try to mount it first
sudo mount /dev/$yourdrive -t hfsplus /media/mac
replacing $yourdrive with the right value ;)
now your parition should be mounted on /media/mac
now you probably want this partition automatically mounted on boot ...
the way you rename on other drives I guess ;)
